name: Annabelle
info: She will be wary of you so start by ignoring her! She’ll grumble at you if you get too close! From time to time she suffers from a blocked tear duct. It's not serious and the vet has seen it and prefers to leave it.  It hasn’t been an issue for many years but just keep an eye on her. She will take food from your hand if she’s in the right mood!

name: Bean
info: Bean is a little shy but gets used to you quickly. She comes to you when she wants to be petted. Attention: she sometimes bites when you pet her. As a token of love. As a indoor cat, she keeps herself fit on a running wheel.

name: Bella
info: Bella is always very curious and eager to explore anything you keep within her reach. She doesn't fly much but is a good walker and a superb climber. You can carry her around on the back of your hand, arm or shoulder.

name: Beyonce
info: Beyonce was a very funny chicken. And very curious. She followed us everywhere. We had great fun on our joined worm hunts.

name: Bismarck, aka Biz
info: Biz is a rather big old boy. He sleeps a lot. When going for walks he can sometimes be a bit annoying as he pulls very hard on the leash. I started exercises to made him run along the bike. That worked very well.

name: Boadie
info: A very cute little spring or cocker spaniel. Likes cuddles, of course food and walks. And likes to chase tennis balls in the garden. Gets along very well with the free running chicken.

name: Boefje
info: Boefje means Rascal. She lives together with Biz, a german pointer. They do get along each other quite good. Boefje goes in and out. She waits before the door when she wants to be let in again.

name: Bunnies
info: Actually, not much to say about these guys. Not sure if they are guys at all. Rather shy.

name: Button
info: Button is a 13 year old dark brown male. He has never mated and we just keep him because he's gorgeous. He may let you scratch his neck and give him a rub

name: Carapatte
info: Carapatte came as a surprise. We didn't expect her on our sit. She is a free running, self-contained turtle and lives in the garden. You can attract her easily with lettuce leaves.

name: Charlotte
info: Charlotte is a 7 year old Beagle girl. Sleeping, eating, sniffing - that's all you need in life. And she likes belly scratching. Walking can sometimes be a challenge as there are so many tracks to follow, corners to sniff at and such. Best to take your time and don't rush. Charlotte lives together with Luigi, a Bengal cat. They do like each other.

name: Chica&Rosie
info: Chica is a 16 year old white Diva! She is the boss in the girls group. We probably liked her most because she was the most trusting. Rosie is an 11 year old fawn/white female.  Rosie is from Chica. Rosie is a little timid but gentle and sweet and will take food from your hand. She and Ebony are best mates!

name: Chicken-HBosch
info: Mevrouw van Puffele, Cato, Trees, Bolle, Lola, No 1 of the two sisters, No 2 of the 2 sisters, Kruimel, Tante Nei Goldie Hawn, Spikkel

name: Chicken-Koblenz
info: Kirke, Karamella, Daphne, Penepole, Alani. All ladies. Very interesting to watch them as a social group. Daphne, altough the smallest was top hen. First to enter or leave the hen house, first at the feeding ground. Kirke, the biggest was last in the hacking order. She made up for this by sheer cheekiness. They accepted me as part of the group and useful for up-turning stones during our worm hunts. Great fun!

name: Chicken-Koblenz-2
info: see Chicken-Koblenz

name: Cinnamon
info: Cinnamon is a sweet girl. Likes cuddles, easy to walk on leash, and we got her to run along the bike. Running on the beach is what she likes most. At this second sit with Cinnamon, we had to limit the running time due to an injury she sustained previously to our sit .

name: Ebony
info: Ebony,  black, 12 years old, can seem a little timid but she just takes more time to get to know you! She was bottle fed but has always been timid and will rarely take food from your hand. She is the look out alpaca so is usually the one who sounds a warning if she sees anything threatening! The warning is a bit like a donkeys braying and when they hear it, the alpacas will all stand and look towards whatever has caused the alarm. Should you hear the alarm, check out what the problem is as its rare to hear it! Sometimes a strange cat is the reason.

name: Eko
info: Eko - a handsome friendly golden retriever. He loves retrieving stones; no pieces of wood or branches. Just stones! He is a great swimmer and diver too. We had a good time together in Lake Neuchatel. He does fetch stones in the lake as well and to no end. Eko also likes walks and is very good and well behaved with other dogs. We took him off-leash and on-leash. Hint: always carry along some treats and of course stones to get his full attention.

name: Floky
info: Floky is a cute and friendly Golden retriever. He likes cuddles and he likes walks which he couldn't get enough of. When walking, we always kept him on leash, which was no problem for him. He is easy to walk and easy with other dogs (and humans). We started first quite promising exercises to have him run alongside the bicycle. He enjoyed it very much.

name: Gina
info: Old lady pony who shares the stable with Granny and Kingdom. Needs some medication, but is easy to care for. Loves to be petted.

name: Granny
info: Another old lady living together with Gina. She is very good-natured and patient when putting on the harness or changing the blanket at bad weather. We love her.

name: Hannes&Jannes
info: Hannes + Jannes made us smile a lot; 2 funny guys always looking for food and quite companionable. They liked to be brushed and welcomed us with excited noises.

name: Hannes
info: see Hannes + Jannes.

name: Henry&Wilhelmina
info: Henry (boy, 3yrs) and Wilhemina (girls, 18yrs) are pure indoor cats (living in 18th floor appartement). They live happy together with 2 dachshunds.

name: Jett
info: Very old indoor male Dachshund. Lives together with Louie, Henry and Wilhelmina on 18th floor appartment overlooking A'dam central and harbour.

name: Kirke
info: Kirke, a mad chicken in Koblenz. Last in the hacking order of the girls, first under my favourites.

name: Lea
info: Tiny little black cat. Goes in and out on her own. LOVES cuddles.

name: Lea&Lara
info: Lea & Lara are sisters and live together with Martha, an australian sheppard. They like to go in and out to their liking. When it comes to cuddling, the cats Lea and Lara are winner and still champion.

name: Louie
info: Dachshund. Does walks but likes to be back home on the sofa. Lives together with Jet, Henry and Wilhelmina on 18th floor appartment overlooking A'dam central and harbour.

name: Louie&Jones
info: Louie & Jones are brothers. They are very affectionate and energetic. It took them not even 1 hour to get used to us. They like to run freely in the garden, returning every few minutes to check if we are still around and to ask for their cuddles.

name: Luigi
info: Beautiful Bengal tomcat. He was very shy at the start. Strange new humans in my house! Can I trust them? He relaxed after a while and it was quite heart warming to see him come and ask for cuddles. In the end, he kept following us around, joining us whenever we were working on the notebook or watching TV on the sofa

name: Martha
info: Martha, an australian sheppard. She is well behaved, easy to walk with (even along bicycle) and great fun to cuddle.

name: Martha2
info: see Martha.

name: Mila
info: Mila lives together with Sam, a labradoodle. Mila is more settled down. She is senior and puts Sam into place when she doesn't behave properly. Once Mila even told Sam off when Sam tried to pinch some food out of the store room. We took Mila and Sam on leash on our short walks in the neighbourhood. That's when they tend to pull a bit. On our long walks at the beach, both run free chasing balls and digging holes in the sand. Both loves cuddles

name: Neo
info: Neo is a tiny black tomcat. Easy to care. Very self-sufficient; comes and goes as he pleases. Nevertheless, likes cuddling very much (second to food) and asks for it. We were more than willing to obey :-) . Sooo cute. Only cat ever joining me on my walks (with Eko).

name: Purzel
info: Purzel, a 4 year old tomcat, has been a bit shy in the beginning. Once he realized that we would be the ones to open the food can in the near future, he became more trusting. In the evenings or after a night out, he always curled up right next to uson the sofa and asked for cuddles. He also tells you when he doesn't like it ;-)

name: Sam
info: Sam lives together with Mila. Sam made us laugh a lot. She is very energetic, a great jumper (flying Sam:-) and sometimes jealous when Mila gets more attention.

name: Speck
info: A very kind and pleasant dog. He is quite old now and needs his medicine. The walks are very slow and short. And sometimes he needs support climbing steps. Nevertheless, such a good-natured character.

name: Summer
info: Such a lovely and affectionate lady dog. She is a real sunshine and has made her way into our hearts. Always cheerful and always eager to join us wherever we go. It is really hard to be unhappy in her company.

name: Tenzing
info: Tenzing is of high age and is very deaf. He is very affectionate and loves cuddles, laps and to be stroked.

name: Waffles
info: Waffles, welcomed us right away, asking for cuddles. And she followed us around wherever we went.

name: Wrigley
info: Wrigley was a bit shy in the beginning but became very trusting and affectionate over time. She won our hearts.

name: Birds-Warburg
info: Lots of budgies.

name: Chicken-Warburg
info: 9 chicken of different breed. Always busy. Actually the main attraction of this sit.

name: Louis-Lux
info: Energetic and lovable Australian sheppard. Pulls a bit when passing scooters and cyclists. Became friends after 1 hour.

name: Mephisto&Fatty
info: Mephisto (black) and Azrael (aka Fatty) are 2 tomcats, 13 and 16 yrs old. Both are very independent and sel-contained, walking in and out at their liking. Fatty sometimes can be a bit crumpy and likes his privacy. Of course, he needs cuddling as well but wouldn't admit it.

name: Mowgli
info: A lovable border terrier. Lives together with Jenna. Enjoys hunting down rats! If no rats, switches to hedgehogs :(

name: Pico
info: Just another cat.

name: Suri
info: Suri lives together with Pico and all the chicken in Warburg. Pico accepted us from the beginning and joined us as much as she could

name: Hudson
info: Hudson. A playful and lovely chocolate brown teenage labrador boy. We got started to have him run along the bike. Promissing start :-)

name: Fred
info: (Man)Fred is the sweetest and most affectionate dog you can imagine. A big and charming dog. Likes running, cuddles, feeding. He lives together with Remy and an old cat Sharky and they like each other. He is very popular among neighbours and friends and other dog-walking humans. He is easy and friendly with other dogs we met during our walks. Very sociable. Fred is one of the few dogs we let run off-leash when sitting. He is very good at commands and retturn upon whistling or calling his name.

name: Fred
info: see Fred.

name: Fred, Remy & Sharky
info: Fred (longhair pointer), Remy (mix breed) and Sharky (cat) live together in an old country house (former farm) in the middle of a forest near Potsdam.

name: Ringo, Sumi and Fuchsi
info: Ringo (warmblood, 26yrs), Sumi (thoroughbred, 18yrs) and Fuchsi (thoroughbred) live together in in an old country house (former farm) in the middle of a forest near Potsdam.

name: Ringo, Sumi and Fuchsi
info: Ringo (warmblood, 26yrs), Sumi (thoroughbred, 18yrs) and Fuchsi (thoroughbred) live together in in an old country house (former farm) in the middle of a forest near Potsdam. Ringo is the alpha and Fuchsi is omega horse in the group.

name: Remy
info: Remy lives together with Fred and the cat Sharky in an old country house (former a farm) in the middle of a forest near Potsdam. Remy is already quite old and loves to lie on his cushion. But he really looks forward to our walks. In the company of Fred, he somewhat fades into the background. Fred gets most of the attention.

name: Sharky
info: Sharky lives together with the dogs Fred and and Remy in an old country house (former a farm) in the middle of a forest near Potsdam. She gets along quite well with the dogs. They seem to respect her as senior. Sharky is quite old and needs medicine with her meals. Sharky did not like us to fill in for Annabelle and Benjamin, the pet owners, and protested at the start (protest pee). She than however warmed up and joined us whenever we sat on the sofa to sit in our laps.

name: Ringo&Sumi
info: Ringo (warmblood, 26yrs) and Sumi (thoroughbred, 18yrs) and Fuchsi (thoroughbred) live together in an old country house (former a farm) in the middle of a forest near Potsdam. Ringo and Sumi are best mates.

name: Ringo
info: Ringo (warmblood, 26yrs) and Sumi (thoroughbred, 18yrs) and Fuchsi (thoroughbred) live together in in an old country house (former a farm) in the middle of a forest near Potsdam. Ringo is top boy and gets fed first.

name: Genna
info: A lovable border terrier. Lives together with Mowgli. Enjoys walking (she decides where to go) and playing with Mowgli.

name: Ragnar
info: Ragnar - does not talk much.

name: Norbert&Henry
info: Tomcat Maine Coons brothers. They are in- and outdoor cats. As they did not grew up at this place, outdoor movement is controlled by a fence emmitting low electric impulses which make the cats stay within the garden.

name: Eko
info: Eko - a great swimmer and diver too. We had a good time together  swimming in Lake Neuchatel. He does fetch stones in the lake to no end and all sizes.

name: Cinnamon
info: see Cinnamon

name: Luigi2
info: (see Luigi)

name: Vegas
info: Vegas, featuring Susanne: labrador lady - absolutely sweet. You'll never walk alone.

name: Vegas
info: Vegas: labrador lady - with her boy friend Li from down the road.

name: Vegas
info: Vegas: labrador lady - enjoying the sun and cuddles.

name: Oilily
info: Oilily: pony - a very sweet and calm horse. Here in the company of one of our donkeys.

name: Oilily
info: Oilily: pony - a very sweet and calm horse. Here in the company of one of our donkeys (and Susanne).

name: Donkey 1...5
info: our donkeys - so calm, patient and friendly. Love carrots and love beeing brushed and cuddled

name: Donkey 1...5
info: our donkeys - so calm, patient and friendly. Love carrots and love beeing brushed and cuddled. If no human available, then they clean each other.

name: Donkey 1...5
info: cuddle time

name: Donkey 1...5
info: cuddle time

name: Cielo
info: Cielo, 4 year old tomcat. Great hunter and jumper. Sleeps in between hunts and jumps.

name: Cielo
info: Cielo, 4 year old tomcat. Cielo, the sky is the limit.

name: Bunny
info: Bunny, 5 year old rabbit.

name: Bunny
info: Bunny, 5 year old rabbit. Here with his best friend, Vegas.

name: Chicken-HBosch
info: Very cute chicken. Very friendly and curious. Loves to be stroked and cuddled.

name: Chicken-HBosch
info: our chicken.

name: Henry/Norbert
info: Henry/Norbert. ready to go.

name: Cinnemon
info: Cinnemon. Old friends; 3rd sit.
